mymetal.post.newmain.check_same(my_stretch_factor=0.001, mycontent_dic=[{'ENCUT': 300, 'ISMEAR': 0.2}], mycontent_check=[{'ADDGRID': 'supportgrid', 'EDIFF': 1e-08, 'EDIFFG': -0.0005, 'ENCUT': 550.0, 'IALGO': 38, 'ICHARG': 1, 'ISIF': 3, 'ISMEAR': 1, 'ISPIN': 1, 'ISTART': 0, 'LREAL': 'F', 'NKPTS': 3268, 'PREC': 'accura', 'RWIGS': 2.84, 'SIGMA': 0.2, 'VOSKOWN': 1}], all_is_same_list=[])

Now we compare the parameter in my_stretch_factor with the mycontent_check

we have two dictionaries, mycontent_dic (dictionary), mycontent_check (list of dictionary)

do a loop for mycontent_check, if the value of mycontent_dic is not same as those of my_content_check

save a flase value for is_same_dic[key]

combined the results with all_is_same_list (a list of a dictionary) [{‘ENCUT’: 300, ‘ISMEAR’: 0.20}]

after search on every 7 my_stretch_factor, we have a all_is_same_list ( a list of 7 dictionary)

Note, for folat or int, normalize_float_int to keep 0.2 is same as 0.20

mymetal.post.newmain.myfindall(filename, char, basic_pattern='', match_type='int', end_pattern='', mycontent=[], switch=1, basic_content1='', myindex1=0, basic_content2='', myindex2=1, search_once=False, specified_num=[], move_list_down_up=[10, 5], length=6)

parameters: first,second - universal, third - fmax, 4-th - warning

functions: myfindall_universal (extract other parameters), myfindall_warning (extract warning and advice), myfindall_fmax (extract fmax)

functions: myfindall_universal (extract other parameters), myfindall_warning (extract warning and advice), myfindall_fmax (extract fmax)

my_switch (in universal function to simplify the code to change its type, and add more functions)

find_fmax (in fmax function to extract the force component, and sqrt() it)

mymetal.post.newmain.read_OUTCAR(filenames: list = None, config: dict = None)
mymetal.post.newmain.write_check(all_is_same_list, post_path='./y_dir/y_post_path.txt', mycontent_check=[{'ADDGRID': 'supportgrid', 'EDIFF': 1e-08, 'EDIFFG': -0.0005, 'ENCUT': 550.0, 'IALGO': 38, 'ICHARG': 1, 'ISIF': 3, 'ISMEAR': 1, 'ISPIN': 1, 'ISTART': 0, 'LREAL': 'F', 'NKPTS': 3268, 'PREC': 'accura', 'RWIGS': 2.84, 'SIGMA': 0.2, 'VOSKOWN': 1}], tag_split='   ', tag_end='\n\n', tag_begin='\n', left=False, num=13)

After loop, we have a all_is_same_list ( a list of 7 dictionary)

and_opera_check is a all True dictionary

is_common_dic saved combined results

create_content return a char “n Encut 500 OKn”, and append to mycontent

list_to_char to change to char, and write it

mymetal.post.newmain.write_convergence(tag_convergence, mycontent)

mymetal.post.oldmain.check_same(my_stretch_factor=0.001, mycontent_dic=[{'ENCUT': 300, 'ISMEAR': 0.2}], mycontent_check=[{'ADDGRID': 'supportgrid', 'EDIFF': 1e-08, 'EDIFFG': -0.0005, 'ENCUT': 550.0, 'IALGO': 38, 'ICHARG': 1, 'ISIF': 3, 'ISMEAR': 1, 'ISPIN': 1, 'ISTART': 0, 'LREAL': 'F', 'NKPTS': 3268, 'PREC': 'accura', 'RWIGS': 2.84, 'SIGMA': 0.2, 'VOSKOWN': 1}], all_is_same_list=[])

Now we compare the parameter in my_stretch_factor with the mycontent_check

we have two dictionaries, mycontent_dic (dictionary), mycontent_check (list of dictionary)

do a loop for mycontent_check, if the value of mycontent_dic is not same as those of my_content_check

save a flase value for is_same_dic[key]

combined the results with all_is_same_list (a list of a dictionary) [{‘ENCUT’: 300, ‘ISMEAR’: 0.20}]

after search on every 7 my_stretch_factor, we have a all_is_same_list ( a list of 7 dictionary)

Note, for folat or int, normalize_float_int to keep 0.2 is same as 0.20

mymetal.post.oldmain.my_read_vasp(filename='CONTCAR') → Atoms

Import POSCAR/CONTCAR type file.

Reads unitcell, atom positions and constraints from the POSCAR/CONTCAR file and tries to read atom types from POSCAR/CONTCAR header, if this fails the atom types are read from OUTCAR or POTCAR file.

mymetal.post.oldmain.myfindall(filename, char, basic_pattern='', match_type='int', end_pattern='', mycontent=[], switch=1, basic_content1='', myindex1=0, basic_content2='', myindex2=1, search_once=False, specified_num=[], move_list_down_up=[10, 5], length=6)

parameters: first,second - universal, third - fmax, 4-th - warning

functions: myfindall_universal (extract other parameters), myfindall_warning (extract warning and advice), myfindall_fmax (extract fmax)

functions: myfindall_universal (extract other parameters), myfindall_warning (extract warning and advice), myfindall_fmax (extract fmax)

my_switch (in universal function to simplify the code to change its type, and add more functions)

find_fmax (in fmax function to extract the force component, and sqrt() it)
